com.drgarbage.bytecode.instructions

Interface ILocalVariableIndexProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IncrementInstruction, RetInstruction, XLoadStoreNInstruction, XLoadStoreNInstruction.XLoadInstruction, XLoadStoreNInstruction.XLoadNInstruction, XLoadStoreNInstruction.XStoreInstruction, XLoadStoreNInstruction.XStoreNInstruction

    public interface ILocalVariableIndexProvider
    Implemented by instructions, which load from or store into a local variable. The index can be looked up in the the local variable table (if available), of the Code attribute.
    Author:
    Peter Palaga

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INVALID_INDEX
      A constant experssing an invalid index which can be returned by getLocalVariableIndex().

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLocalVariableIndex()
      Returns an index of of a local variable in the local variables array.

    • Field Detail

      • INVALID_INDEX

        static final int INVALID_INDEX
        A constant experssing an invalid index which can be returned by getLocalVariableIndex().
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalVariableIndex

        int getLocalVariableIndex()
        Returns an index of of a local variable in the local variables array.
        Returns:
        An index of the local variables array
